data.description: The Data and Security Laboratory, or D&S Lab, at Fujitsu specializes in integrating research in AI and security to build trust in the increasingly diverse digital society. We are seeking exceptional researchers to join our D&S Lab in the US. This position provides an opportunity to solve problems on safety, privacy, and AI alignment in LLM-based multi-agent systems. We value individuals with vision to pick up new knowledge, see through complex scenarios and arrive at simple, elegant yet workable solutions. Self-driven nature, creativity, communication skills, and attention to details are traits of a successful researcher in this role. An intern has an option to work either full time or part time during the academic year. Job responsibilities 1. Research on topic(s) including but not limited to developing algorithms and models for privacy-preserving, detection/prevention for adversarial agents, and alignment with user perceptions, and agent discovery/federation in agentic AI syst...
